# ecuritysay ocusedfay . upgradableyay . uiltbay otay astlay . 

Tezos isyay anyay open-sourceyay atformplay orfay assetsyay andyay applicationsyay ackedbay ybay ayay obalglay ommunitycay ofyay alidatorsvay , esearchersray , andyay uildersbay .   

<Button
    text='accessyay eveloperday ortalpay'
    href='/developer-portal'/>
<Button
    text='artstay earninglay'
    href='../docs/learn/what-is-tezos'
    inverse='True'/>

---

### ecuresay , institutionalyay adegray  Smart Contracts

Tezos isyay esignedday otay ovidepray ethay afetysay andyay odecay orrectnesscay equiredray orfay assetsyay andyay otheryay ighhay aluevay useyay asescay . itsyay ativenay artsmay ontractcay anguagelay , ichelsonmay , acilitatesfay ormalfay erificationvay , ayay ethodologymay ommonlycay usedyay inyay ission-criticalmay environmentsyay uchsay asyay ethay aerospaceyay , uclearnay , andyay emiconductorsay industriesyay . 

### upgradableyay otay ethay atestay ofyay ethay artyay

Tezos' odularmay architectureyay andyay ormalfay upgradeyay echanismmay allowyay ethay etworknay otay oposepray andyay adoptyay ewnay echnologicaltay innovationsyay oothlysmay asyay eythay emergeyay . esethay aspectsyay , ombinedcay ithway ezos'tay on-chainyay invoicingyay echanismmay , enableyay ethay otocolpray otay emainray ethay ate-of-the-artstay onglay intoyay ethay uturefay -- ithoutway acrificingsay ommunitycay onsensuscay . 

### openyay articipationpay andyay incentiveyay alignmentyay

inyay Tezos, allyay akeholdersstay aymay articipatepay inyay etworknay upgradesyay ybay evaluatingyay , oposingpray , oryay approvingyay amendmentsyay . unlikeyay inyay oof-of-workpray andyay otheryay oof-of-stakepray etworksnay , allyay akeholdersstay ancay elphay otay ecuresay ethay etworknay (iavay akingbay oryay elegatingday) , andyay avoidyay eingbay ilutedday ybay inflationyay.


---

### Tezos addressesyay eykay arriersbay acingfay ockchainblay adoptionyay otay date: artsmay ontractcay afetysay , ong-termlay upgradabilityyay , andyay openyay articipationpay . 

---

# areyay ouyay interestedyay inyay orkingway ull-timefay onyayTezos?



## urrentcay openingsyay acrossyay ethay Tezos ecosystemyay


Tezos isyay ethay oductpray ofyay anymay organizationsyay andyay individualsyay acrossyay ethay obeglay orkingway ogethertay onyay anyay open-sourceyay ojectpray . 

don’t eesay ethay erfectpay oleray orfay ouyay utbay antway otay orkway onyay Tezos? eachray outyay otay ethay [orkway onyay Tezos ailboxmay](mailto:jobsfair@tezos.com) - includeyay ouryay esumeray , atwhay you’re ookinglay orfay , andyay ywhay you’re excitedyay otay orkway onyay Tezos. esumesray areyay aredshay ithway ayay umbernay ofyay organizationsyay inyay ethay Tezos ecosystemyay.

otenay: istingslay areyay ovidedpray ybay eachyay eamtay eparatelysay . ifyay ouyay areyay anyay organizationyay inyay ethay Tezos ecosystemyay atthay isyay iringhay andyay interestedyay inyay istinglay ouryay openyay olesray erehay , easeplay emailyay ethay [orkway onyay Tezos ailboxmay](mailto:jobsfair@tezos.com).

# Tezos updates
---
## <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64,"/> Tezos protocol

13 ebruaryfay 2021 ethay Tezos ockchainblay uccessfullysay upgradedyay ybay adoptingyay Edo atyay ockblay 1,343,489. ointlyjay evelopedday ybay Nomadic Labs, Marigold, DaiLambda, and Metastate, Edo isyay ethay ifthfay Tezos upgradeyay.

8 ebruaryfay 2021 Tarides eamtay announcesyay atthay eythay areyay ontributingcay ayay ub-treessay eaturefay otay ethay extnay Tezos otocolpray oposalpray.

1 ebruaryfay 2021 ethay atestlay Tezos upgradeyay oposalpray, Edo, ashay eachedray ethay uorumqay andyay illway ogay ivelay ircacay ebruraryfay 13 ifyay ethay >80% approvalyay oldshay.

---

## <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64,"/> Development:

22 ebruraryfay 2021 Madfish Solutions eleasesray anyay interactiveyay andbookhay orfay onvertingcay Solidity ontractscay intoyay LIGO.

17 ebruraryfay 2021 Claude Barde ovidedpray ayay eakdownbray ofyay owhay otay uildbay ithway ethay Kolibri Stablecoin, kUSD.

9 ebruraryfay 2021 USDS, ayay USD-ackedbay ablecoinstay omfray ethay eamtay atyayStably, auncheslay onyay Tezos.

---

## <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64,"/>Ecosystem:

26 ebruraryfay 2021 Tezos Ukraine ostshay ayay DeFi evelopmentday ackathonhay. ethay orkshopsyay, ichwhay areyay inyay ussianray , ancay ebay iewedvay erehay.

17 ebruraryfay 2021 BRD ownay upportssay Tezos. usersyay ancay anagemay eirthay tez andyay elegateday otay anyyay akerbay iavay ethay opularpay obilemay alletway.

10 ebruraryfay 2021 OpenSea announcesyay atthay ityay illway upportsay Tezos-asedbay NFTs, enablingyay ethay Tezos ommunitycay otay iewvay andyay adetray NFTs onyay ethay atformplay.

---
